html:
{{ doc.company or "" }}
Salary Slip: {{ doc.name }}
Period: {{ doc.start_date }} - {{ doc.end_date }}
Posting: {{ doc.posting_date or "" }}
Employee
Name{{ doc.employee_name or '' }}
Employee ID{{ doc.employee or '' }}
Department{{ doc.department or '' }}
Designation{{ doc.designation or '' }}
Payroll
Salary Structure{{ doc.salary_structure or '' }}
Employee Type{{ doc.employee_type or '' }}
Payment days{{ doc.payment_days or '' }}
Earnings
{% set eidx = 0 %} {% for e in doc.earnings or [] %} {% set eidx = eidx + 1 %} {% endfor %} {% if eidx == 0 %} {% endif %}
#ComponentAmount (UGX)
{{ eidx }} {{ e.salary_component or e.description or '' }} {{ "{:,.0f}".format(e.amount or 0) }}
No earnings recorded
Statutory Components
{% set sidx = 0 %} {% set paye_amt = 0.0 %} {% set nssf_amt = 0.0 %} {% for d in doc.deductions or [] %} {% set comp = (d.salary_component or '') %} {% if comp and (comp.upper().find('PAYE') != -1 or comp.upper().find('NSSF') != -1) %} {% set sidx = sidx + 1 %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% if sidx == 0 %} {% endif %}
#ComponentAmount (UGX)
{{ sidx }} {{ comp }} {{ "{:,.0f}".format(d.amount or 0) }} {% if comp.upper().find('PAYE') != -1 %}{% set paye_amt = paye_amt + (d.amount or 0) %}{% endif %} {% if comp.upper().find('NSSF') != -1 %}{% set nssf_amt = nssf_amt + (d.amount or 0) %}{% endif %}
No statutory components
Other Deductions
{% set oidx = 0 %} {% set other_total = 0.0 %} {% for d in doc.deductions or [] %} {% set comp = (d.salary_component or '') %} {% if comp and not (comp.upper().find('PAYE') != -1 or comp.upper().find('NSSF') != -1) %} {% set oidx = oidx + 1 %} {% set other_total = other_total + (d.amount or 0) %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% if oidx == 0 %} {% endif %}
#ComponentAmount (UGX)
{{ oidx }} {{ comp }} {{ "{:,.0f}".format(d.amount or 0) }}
No other deductions
{# Totals logic #} {% if doc.gross_pay %} {% set gross_total = doc.gross_pay %} {% else %} {% set gross_total = 0.0 %} {% for e in doc.earnings or [] %}{% set gross_total = gross_total + (e.amount or 0) %}{% endfor %} {% endif %} {% set statutory_total = (paye_amt or 0.0) + (nssf_amt or 0.0) %} {# Net = Gross - other deductions (exclude PAYE & NSSF) #} {% set total_deduction = other_total %} {% set net_pay = gross_total - total_deduction %}
Gross Pay: {{ "{:,.0f}".format(gross_total or 0) }}
Statutory Total (PAYE + NSSF): {{ "{:,.0f}".format(statutory_total or 0) }}
Other Deductions: {{ "{:,.0f}".format(other_total or 0) }}
Total Deduction (excl. PAYE & NSSF): {{ "{:,.0f}".format(total_deduction or 0) }}
Net Pay: {{ "{:,.0f}".format(net_pay or 0) }}
Amount in words: {{ frappe.utils.money_in_words(net_pay|round(0), 'UGX') }}
Statutory components are shown separately. Net Pay excludes PAYE & NSSF per configured policy.
name: Factory Salary Slip
